Speech recognizer turned off You may speak now
Voice Recognition tips: This demo displays the voice recognition service capability. You can tap the voice detection button to enable the microphone to continuously recognize surrounding sounds. If a specified type of sound is displayed, the recognition result is displayed. Tap Stop to stop voice recognition. Currently, the voice recognition service supports 13 voice types, include infant or child cry, shout, cat bark, dog bark, water, knock, door bell, car horn, fire alarm, alarm, laughter, sneeze, and snoring. voice type Voice Recognition start Voice Recognition stop Voice Recognition error:
